subject: Career
title: Ikigai and Sustainable Purpose
description: A 60-second lesson on Ikigai and Sustainable Purpose.

hook.text: In Okinawa, Japan, centenarians don't retire. They have ikigai â€” a reason to get up each morning. And they outlive us.

buildup.text: Ikigai sits at the intersection of what you love, what you're good at, what the world needs, and what pays.

discovery.text: Purpose-driven workers report 64% higher fulfillment and are three times more resilient to burnout.

twist.text: Ikigai isn't found in one dramatic revelation. It emerges gradually through exploration and reflection.

climax.text: You don't need to find your 'passion.' Find what sustainably energizes you and aligns with your values.

punchline.text: Purpose doesn't prevent hard days. It gives you a reason to get through them.
